metadata.title: CVE-2024-43872 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix soft lockup under heavy CEQE loadCEQEs are handled in interrupt handler currently. This may cause theCPU core staying in interrupt context too long and lead to soft lockupunder heavy load.Handle CEQEs in BH workqueue and set an upper limit for the number ofCEQE handled by a single call of work handler.
